overview: "To a Woman About a Woman" is a sample of agitation popular science film of the early twentieth century, the essence of which is reduced to educational propaganda, which was common and widespread for the USSR at that time. The documentary encourages women to monitor their health, do not forget about body hygiene and clearly demonstrates what and how to do in the care of themselves and their bodies. The picture was taken together with a scientific consultant - Professor of Gynecology Alexander Krupsky.
title: To a Woman About a Woman
